price: 40. „Kad mes sektume burtininkais [kurie buvo Firauno (Faraono) netikėjimo religijos], jei jie bus laimėtojai.“
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
